thread.title: ‘Good’ to review Fed inflation framework but change needs proof: Bullard

author: cmullen
title: ‘Good’ to review Fed inflation framework but change needs proof: Bullard
text: February 26, 2018 / 2:08 PM / Updated 7 hours ago 'Good' to review Fed inflation framework but change needs proof: Bullard Reuters Staff 1 Min Read WASHINGTON (Reuters) - It would be good for the Federal Reserve to regularly review its inflation framework but any change would require conviction that a new set up would provide benefits over the current 2 percent target, St. Louis Fed President James Bullard said on Monday. Several Fed policymakers have advocated a review of how the Fed sets its inflation target and “that is a good thing to do and I am hopeful the committee will go ahead and do it,” Bullard said. But to change “you would have to get buy-in from the political side. You would have to get buy-in from the larger financial community.” Reporting by Howard SchneiderEditing by Chizu Nomiyama
